16  package org.apache.ibatis.submitted.cache;
17  
18  import java.io.Reader;
19  import java.lang.reflect.Field;
20  import java.sql.Connection;
21  
22  import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.CacheNamespace;
23  import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Property;
24  import org.apache.ibatis.cache.Cache;
25  import org.apache.ibatis.cache.CacheException;
26  import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.CacheNamespaceRef;
27  import org.apache.ibatis.builder.BuilderException;
28  import org.apache.ibatis.io.Resources;
29  import org.apache.ibatis.jdbc.ScriptRunner;
30  import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSession;
31  import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactory;
32  import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactoryBuilder;
33  import org.junit.Assert;
34  import org.junit.Before;
35  import org.junit.Rule;
36  import org.junit.Test;
37  import org.junit.rules.ExpectedException;
38  
39  // issue #524
40  public class CacheTest {
41  
42    private static SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory;
43  
44    @Rule
45    public ExpectedException expectedException = ExpectedException.none();
46  
47    @Before
48    public void setUp() throws Exception {
49      // create a SqlSessionFactory
50      Reader reader = Resources.getResourceAsReader("org/apache/ibatis/submitted/cache/mybatis-config.xml");
51      sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(reader);
52      reader.close();
53  
54      // populate in-memory database
55      SqlSession session = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
56      Connection conn = session.getConnection();
57      reader = Resources.getResourceAsReader("org/apache/ibatis/submitted/cache/CreateDB.sql");
58      ScriptRunner runner = new ScriptRunner(conn);
59      runner.setLogWriter(null);
60      runner.runScript(reader);
61      reader.close();
62      session.close();
63    }
64  
65    /*
66     * Test Plan: 
67     *  1) SqlSession 1 executes "select * from A".
68     *  2) SqlSession 1 closes.
69     *  3) SqlSession 2 executes "delete from A where id = 1"
70     *  4) SqlSession 2 executes "select * from A"
71     *
72     * Assert:
73     *   Step 4 returns 1 row. (This case fails when caching is enabled.)
74     */
75    @Test
76    public void testplan1() {
77      SqlSession sqlSession1 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(false);
78      try {
79        PersonMapper pm = sqlSession1.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
80        Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
81      } finally {
82        sqlSession1.close();
83      }
84  
85      SqlSession sqlSession2 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(false);
86      try {
87        PersonMapper pm = sqlSession2.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
88        pm.delete(1);
89        Assert.assertEquals(1, pm.findAll().size());
90      } finally {
91        sqlSession2.commit();
92        sqlSession2.close();
93      }
94    }
95  
96    /*
97     * Test Plan: 
98     *  1) SqlSession 1 executes "select * from A".
99     *  2) SqlSession 1 closes.
100    *  3) SqlSession 2 executes "delete from A where id = 1"
101    *  4) SqlSession 2 executes "select * from A"
102    *  5) SqlSession 2 rollback
103    *  6) SqlSession 3 executes "select * from A"
104    *
105    * Assert:
106    *   Step 6 returns 2 rows. 
107    */
108   @Test
109   public void testplan2() {
110     SqlSession sqlSession1 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(false);
111     try {
112       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession1.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
113       Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
114     } finally {
115       sqlSession1.close();
116     }
117 
118     SqlSession sqlSession2 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(false);
119     try {
120       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession2.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
121       pm.delete(1);
122     } finally {
123       sqlSession2.rollback();
124       sqlSession2.close();
125     }
126 
127     SqlSession sqlSession3 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(false);
128     try {
129       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession3.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
130       Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
131     } finally {
132       sqlSession3.close();
133     }
134   }
135 
136   /*
137    * Test Plan with Autocommit on:
138    *  1) SqlSession 1 executes "select * from A".
139    *  2) SqlSession 1 closes.
140    *  3) SqlSession 2 executes "delete from A where id = 1"
141    *  4) SqlSession 2 closes.
142    *  5) SqlSession 2 executes "select * from A".
143    *  6) SqlSession 3 closes.
144    *
145    * Assert:
146    *   Step 6 returns 1 row. 
147    */
148   @Test
149   public void testplan3() {
150     SqlSession sqlSession1 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
151     try {
152       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession1.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
153       Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
154     } finally {
155       sqlSession1.close();
156     }
157 
158     SqlSession sqlSession2 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
159     try {
160       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession2.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
161       pm.delete(1);
162     } finally {
163       sqlSession2.close();
164     }
165 
166     SqlSession sqlSession3 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
167     try {
168       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession3.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
169       Assert.assertEquals(1, pm.findAll().size());
170     } finally {
171       sqlSession3.close();
172     }
173   }
174 
175   /*-
176    * Test case for #405
177    *
178    * Test Plan with Autocommit on:
179    *  1) SqlSession 1 executes "select * from A".
180    *  2) SqlSession 1 closes.
181    *  3) SqlSession 2 executes "insert into person (id, firstname, lastname) values (3, hello, world)"
182    *  4) SqlSession 2 closes.
183    *  5) SqlSession 3 executes "select * from A".
184    *  6) SqlSession 3 closes.
185    *
186    * Assert:
187    *   Step 5 returns 3 row.
188    */
189   @Test
190   public void shouldInsertWithOptionsFlushesCache() {
191     SqlSession sqlSession1 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
192     try {
193       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession1.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
194       Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
195     } finally {
196       sqlSession1.close();
197     }
198 
199     SqlSession sqlSession2 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
200     try {
201       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession2.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
202       Person p = new Person(3, "hello", "world");
203       pm.createWithOptions(p);
204     } finally {
205       sqlSession2.close();
206     }
207 
208     SqlSession sqlSession3 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
209     try {
210       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession3.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
211       Assert.assertEquals(3, pm.findAll().size());
212     } finally {
213       sqlSession3.close();
214     }
215   }
216 
217   /*-
218    * Test Plan with Autocommit on:
219    *  1) SqlSession 1 executes select to cache result
220    *  2) SqlSession 1 closes.
221    *  3) SqlSession 2 executes insert without flushing cache
222    *  4) SqlSession 2 closes.
223    *  5) SqlSession 3 executes select (flushCache = false)
224    *  6) SqlSession 3 closes.
225    *  7) SqlSession 4 executes select (flushCache = true)
226    *  8) SqlSession 4 closes.
227    *
228    * Assert:
229    *   Step 5 returns 2 row.
230    *   Step 7 returns 3 row.
231    */
232   @Test
233   public void shouldApplyFlushCacheOptions() {
234     SqlSession sqlSession1 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
235     try {
236       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession1.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
237       Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
238     } finally {
239       sqlSession1.close();
240     }
241 
242     SqlSession sqlSession2 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
243     try {
244       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession2.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
245       Person p = new Person(3, "hello", "world");
246       pm.createWithoutFlushCache(p);
247     } finally {
248       sqlSession2.close();
249     }
250 
251     SqlSession sqlSession3 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
252     try {
253       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession3.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
254       Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
255     } finally {
256       sqlSession3.close();
257     }
258 
259     SqlSession sqlSession4 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
260     try {
261       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession4.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
262       Assert.assertEquals(3, pm.findWithFlushCache().size());
263     } finally {
264       sqlSession4.close();
265     }
266   }
267 
268   @Test
269   public void shouldApplyCacheNamespaceRef() {
270     {
271       SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
272       try {
273         PersonMapper pm = sqlSession.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
274         Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
275         Person p = new Person(3, "hello", "world");
276         pm.createWithoutFlushCache(p);
277       } finally {
278         sqlSession.close();
279       }
280     }
281     {
282       SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
283       try {
284         PersonMapper pm = sqlSession.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
285         Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
286       } finally {
287         sqlSession.close();
288       }
289     }
290     {
291       SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
292       try {
293         ImportantPersonMapper pm = sqlSession.getMapper(ImportantPersonMapper.class);
294         Assert.assertEquals(3, pm.findWithFlushCache().size());
295       } finally {
296         sqlSession.close();
297       }
298     }
299     {
300       SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
301       try {
302         PersonMapper pm = sqlSession.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
303         Assert.assertEquals(3, pm.findAll().size());
304         Person p = new Person(4, "foo", "bar");
305         pm.createWithoutFlushCache(p);
306       } finally {
307         sqlSession.close();
308       }
309     }
310     {
311       SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
312       try {
313         SpecialPersonMapper pm = sqlSession.getMapper(SpecialPersonMapper.class);
314         Assert.assertEquals(4, pm.findWithFlushCache().size());
315       } finally {
316         sqlSession.close();
317       }
318     }
319     {
320       SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
321       try {
322         PersonMapper pm = sqlSession.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
323         Assert.assertEquals(4, pm.findAll().size());
324       } finally {
325         sqlSession.close();
326       }
327     }
328   }
329 
330   @Test
331   public void shouldApplyCustomCacheProperties() {
332     CustomCache customCache = unwrap(sqlSessionFactory.getConfiguration().getCache(CustomCacheMapper.class.getName()));
333     Assert.assertEquals("bar", customCache.getStringValue());
334     Assert.assertEquals(1, customCache.getIntegerValue().intValue());
335     Assert.assertEquals(2, customCache.getIntValue());
336     Assert.assertEquals(3, customCache.getLongWrapperValue().longValue());
337     Assert.assertEquals(4, customCache.getLongValue());
338     Assert.assertEquals(5, customCache.getShortWrapperValue().shortValue());
339     Assert.assertEquals(6, customCache.getShortValue());
340     Assert.assertEquals((float) 7.1, customCache.getFloatWrapperValue(), 0);
341     Assert.assertEquals((float)8.1, customCache.getFloatValue(), 0);
342     Assert.assertEquals(9.01, customCache.getDoubleWrapperValue(), 0);
343     Assert.assertEquals(10.01, customCache.getDoubleValue(), 0);
344     Assert.assertEquals((byte)11, customCache.getByteWrapperValue().byteValue());
345     Assert.assertEquals((byte)12, customCache.getByteValue());
346     Assert.assertEquals(true, customCache.getBooleanWrapperValue());
347     Assert.assertEquals(true, customCache.isBooleanValue());
348   }
349 
350   @Test
351   public void shouldErrorUnsupportedProperties() {
352     expectedException.expect(CacheException.class);
353     expectedException.expectMessage("Unsupported property type for cache: 'date' of type class java.util.Date");
354 
355     sqlSessionFactory.getConfiguration().addMapper(CustomCacheUnsupportedPropertyMapper.class);
356   }
357 
358   @Test
359   public void shouldErrorInvalidCacheNamespaceRefAttributesSpecifyBoth() {
360     expectedException.expect(BuilderException.class);
361     expectedException.expectMessage("Cannot use both value() and name() attribute in the @CacheNamespaceRef");
362 
363     sqlSessionFactory.getConfiguration().getMapperRegistry()
364         .addMapper(InvalidCacheNamespaceRefBothMapper.class);
365   }
366 
367   @Test
368   public void shouldErrorInvalidCacheNamespaceRefAttributesIsEmpty() {
369     expectedException.expect(BuilderException.class);
370     expectedException.expectMessage("Should be specified either value() or name() attribute in the @CacheNamespaceRef");
371 
372     sqlSessionFactory.getConfiguration().getMapperRegistry()
373         .addMapper(InvalidCacheNamespaceRefEmptyMapper.class);
374   }
375 
376   private CustomCache unwrap(Cache cache){
377     Field field;
378     try {
379       field = cache.getClass().getDeclaredField("delegate");
380     } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {
381       throw new IllegalStateException(e);
382     }
383     try {
384       field.setAccessible(true);
385       return (CustomCache)field.get(cache);
386     } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
387       throw new IllegalStateException(e);
388     } finally {
389       field.setAccessible(false);
390     }
391   }
392 
393   @CacheNamespace(implementation = CustomCache.class, properties = {
394       @Property(name = "date", value = "2016/11/21")
395   })
396   private interface CustomCacheUnsupportedPropertyMapper {
397   }
398 
399   @CacheNamespaceRef(value = PersonMapper.class, name = "org.apache.ibatis.submitted.cache.PersonMapper")
400   private interface InvalidCacheNamespaceRefBothMapper {
401   }
402 
403   @CacheNamespaceRef
404   private interface InvalidCacheNamespaceRefEmptyMapper {
405   }
406 
407 }
